{{infobox character | people=[[Gondorians|Gondorian]] | name=Minastan | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Gondor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Westron]] | birth=After {{TA|1516}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Anárion]] | parentage=[[Minardil]] | siblings=[[Telemnar]] | spouse= | children=[[Tarondor (King of Gondor)|Tarondor]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Minastan''' was the second son of King [[Minardil]] of [[Gondor]]. ==History== In {{TA|1636}}{{App|TA}} Minastan's elder brother [[Telemnar]] had sat on their father's throne for just two years when he died with all his heirs in the [[Great Plague]].{{App|Gondor}} Minastan had also died by this time - perhaps he too met his end in the Plague - but he left behind a surviving heir, [[Tarondor (King of Gondor)|Tarondor]], who became the first King of a new line.{{App|South}} ==Etymology== ''Minastan'' is [[Quenya]]. Its meaning is not glossed, but as Paul Strack explains, it might mean "Smith of the Tower" and be a compound of a shortened form ''minas'' of [[minasse]] ("tower") and the suffixal form ''-tan'' of [[tamo]] ("smith, builder").{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-96627655.html|articlename=Q.
